thread.title: Robert J Bfaud
thread.title_full: Experthelp.com reviewed by Robert J Bfaud

author: Robert J Bfaud
title: Robert J Bfaud
text: The "help person" with whom I spolke was knowledgable and hepful He walked me through the problem and it was solved in a very short time. iwas very happy he was availabl on Sunday. The price was a bit steep but I and anxious to get the problem solved becaues I was on my way out of town.
